title: Live for Speed S2 0.6G + unlocker + LAN
description:
==========================================
Live for Speed S2 0.6G + unlocker + L.A.N.
==========================================

Multilanguage


==========================
About this Jimbus edition:
==========================

- Custom installer compressed.
- The game is updated to version 0.6G (September 27, 2014) and nothing has been deleted.
- A tool to unlock every track and car of the S2 version and a modifier of the game executable to be able to play in L.A.N. with programs like Tunngle or Hamachi are included.

Game files are not modified; I mean, they are the same you would get if you downloaded the game from https://www.lfs.net/downloads. If you own the game, just do not apply the unlocker. So, this release is optimal for everybody and not only for those who do not own the game.


=============
Instructions:
=============

1. Mount or unrar the .iso and run the .exe file to install the game..
2. Use the shortcuts the installer creates.
3. (optional) Unlock all the cars and tracks and the possibility to play in L.A.N.
 
 

Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation
